reviewText: I got this at a Wal-Mart for $15. I was a bit hesitant that it would be one of those terrible black-and-white documentaries from the 60s. That was far from the truth. Box included 3 DVDs, 1 covering only Pearl Harbor with the other 2 covering the rest of the Pacific War. The DVDs included video, voice-over, and interviews. It was very thorough for the limited time afforded by 3 disks. I have thoroughly enjoyed watching and re-watching this set. Highly recommend!
Great show I watched time and again, I found some thing new every time I watch it. I think if you buy this and watch it you'll find some thing new you didn't know...
To be honest I was a bit hesitant about buying this dvd but I'm really glad I did.  It's definitely worth the money and now a great part of my collection.
